"The Importance of Looking a Little Funny"

"The Importance of Looking a Little Funny" — Jake Gallagher: “French director/actor Jacques Tati’s biography states that he was born in 1907 and died in 1982, but the truth is Tati was a man immune to time.” Lots of pictures, and a fun read.

Published 10 November 2014
